Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Social media is going wild as people express their outrage over the alleged misuse of taxpayer's funds. A post suggests that taxpayers will be forced to cover renovation expenses for Parliament buildings originally estimated to cost $22 million but now surpassing $90 million. Another user advocates for changes to Australia's gas tax criticizing the current system that allows global gas corporations to avoid paying their fair share. However the other posts lack context and are insufficient to generate a comprehensive and meaningful summary. Stay tuned for more explosive tweets and social-media comments as people vocalize their opinions and concerns.
